Who: VENOM, CHOPSHOP, Lamia
Location: In transit - from Minion Earth Base

> Lamia used her own anti-grav engines and follow them

Venom took the lead with Chopshop and Lamia flying just behind. As
they flew over the rather large island all that could be seen was the
ruin of volcanic activity. While the ground was relatively safe for
mechanical life, its searing temperatures and poisonous gasses were
deadly to any biological life that was unlucky enough to be trapped
here.

However quickly enough their trip took them out into the more
temperate open oceans, the harsh blacks, reds and browns of molten
stone giving way to the beautiful blues, greens and browns of the open
oceans. Occasionally a large fish or oceanic life could be seen
leaping from the waters as the trio flew over it.

Soon enough though they came back over land, the oceans crashed into
tall cliffs, which  quickly turned into trees and underbrush as they
flew on.

"There!" came Venom's voice as they flew. He pointed to a large
clearing where it seemed that something large had crashed.

"Lamia!" Venom's voice came through clearly over the radio,
"Investigate that, and tell me what you find." His voice imperious and
almost disdainful.

(TAG)

Preston
